source.sqlReaderQuery:
select MAX([WatermarkValue]) as NewWatermarkvalue from [dbo].[watermarktable]
where [FileValue] = 'JSON-ONLINE'

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from [dbo].[Tickets] where cast([TransactionDt] as date) >= '@{activity('AC_Lookup_MaxDate').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(cast([TransactionDt] as date)) as NewWatermarkvalue from [dbo].[Tickets]

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from [etl].[tControlMetadata] where sourceFile = iif('@{item().name}' like 'rating%', 'ratings_part*.csv','@{item().name}')
